snippet: CONNORS--Joseph J.,85, on Thursday, June 30, 2016 of Maywood, NJ. Joseph worked for The New York Times for 43 years as a Mailroom Production Manager before retiring in 1992. He was a Veteran of the United States Navy serving during the Korean War....
lead_paragraph: CONNORS--Joseph J.,85, on Thursday, June 30, 2016 of Maywood, NJ. Joseph worked for The New York Times for 43 years as a Mailroom Production Manager before retiring in 1992. He was a Veteran of the United States Navy serving during the Korean War. Joseph was an avid golfer, a health, fitness and sports enthusiast, a longtime Brooklyn Dodger fan and cherished his Irish heritage. Beloved husband of 49 years to the late Patricia (nee Mullane). Loving father of Michael J. Connors and his late wife Lisa, Joseph J. Connors Jr. and his wife Debbie and Patricia Angeli and her husband Rich. Dear brother of the late Joan Hurley, the late Marie Schmidt, the late John Connors and the late Albert Connors. Uncle to many nieces and nephews. Cherished grandfather of Jessica, Angela, Joanna and Colin Joseph Connors. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CONNORS, JOSEPH J.
